price: ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߟߐ߲߫ ߏ߬ ߞߐ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߖߊ߯ߙߋߣߍ߲߫ ߔߊߦߌߔߊߦߌ߫ ߘߐ߫ ߘߏ߲ ߠߊ߫
arabic: ثُمَّ لَنَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ أَوۡلَىٰ بِهَا صِلِيّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: thumma lanaḥnu aʿlamu bi-alladhīna hum awlā bihā ṣiliyyan
